title: Tracking Issue for `trusted_step`

labels.name: T-libs-api
labels.description: Relevant to the library API team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: C-tracking-issue
labels.description: Category: A tracking issue for an RFC or an unstable feature.

body:
Feature gate: `#![feature(trusted_step)]`

This is a tracking issue for the the `TrustedStep` trait. This trait indicates that the implementation of `Step` upholds all stated invariants, allowing certain optimizations to be made. `TrustedLen` is automatically implemented for all range types when `TrustedStep` is implemented.

### Public API

<!--
For most library features, it'd be useful to include a summarized version of the public API.
(E.g. just the public function signatures without their doc comments or implementation.)
-->

```rust
// core::iter
unsafe trait TrustedStep {}
```

### Steps / History

- [x] Implementation: #83772
- [ ] Final commenting period (FCP)
- [ ] Stabilization PR

### Unresolved Questions

- None yet.

### Blockers

- [ ] `min_specialization` #31844
